Text: The Disputes System will provide the user the ability to create or initiate a ticket retrieval request. As part of ticket retrieval creation process, the system must prompt the user to enter all the required information to create the ticket retrieval request. The ticket retrieval request is a document that is sent to merchant inquiring the validity of a transaction.

Condition: As part of ticket retrieval creation process

Trigger: The Disputes System must
Condition: The Disputes System must

Text: System administrators can create reliable report templates that are available to staff, and can be run as is or modified to the staff person's particular needs. Changes in the templates could be done without comprising the results. The administrator can limit the filters and display fields that can be altered to certify a dependable output. For example, front-line staff could set the call number range for a wedding report or add or remove designated display fields from a pick list, but couldn’t alter the template to display deleted items.
Purpose: create reliable report templates
Trigger: System administrators can create
Condition: System administrators can create

Text: System provides distinct, fine-grained permission levels limiting who can create and clone reports. All permissions should be easy to administer. Purpose: limiting who can create and clone reports
easy to administer
Trigger: System provides distinct, fine-grained permission levels
Condition: All permissions should be easy to administer
System_response: allow or disallow staff to run specific reports
run ad hoc reports on specific sets of data

Text: EHR technology must be set by default to perform this capability and, unless this configuration cannot be disabled by any user, the ability to change the configuration must be restricted to a limited set of identified users.
Purpose: set EHR technology by default
Trigger: unless this configuration cannot be disabled by any user
Condition: unless this configuration cannot be disabled by any user
Main_actor: a limited set of identified users
System_response: restrict the ability to change the configuration

Text: (ii) EHR technology is designed to prevent electronic health information from being locally stored on end-user devices after use of EHR technology on those devices stops.
Purpose: prevent electronic health information from being locally stored
Trigger: use of EHR technology on those devices stops
Condition: use of EHR technology on those devices stops

Text: (i) Create a message digest in accordance with the standard specified in § 170.210(c).

Trigger: in accordance with the standard specified in § 170.210(c)
Condition: in accordance with the standard specified in § 170.210(c)

Text: (ii) Verify in accordance with the standard specified in § 170.210(c) upon receipt of electronically exchanged health information that such information has not been altered.
Purpose: Verify in accordance with the standard specified in § 170.210(c)
Trigger: upon receipt of electronically exchanged health information
Condition: upon receipt of electronically exchanged health information
Main_actor: the recipient of the health information
System_response: such information has not been altered

Text: Record disclosures made for treatment, payment, and health care operations in accordance with the standard specified in § 170.210(d).

Condition: in accordance with the standard specified in § 170.210(d)

transition of care or referral summaries

Text: (A) When electronic health information is viewed, downloaded, or transmitted to a third-party using the capabilities included in paragraphs (e)(1)(i)(A) through (C) of this section, the following information must be recorded and made accessible to the patient:
Purpose: record and make accessible to the patient
Trigger: When electronic health information is viewed, downloaded, or transmitted to a third-party
Condition: When electronic health information is viewed, downloaded, or transmitted to a third-party

Text: (B) EHR technology presented for certification may demonstrate compliance with paragraph (e)(1)(ii)(A) of this section if it is also certified to the certification criterion adopted at § 170.314(d)(2) and the information required to be recorded in paragraph (e)(1)(ii)(A) is accessible by the patient.
Purpose: demonstrate compliance
Trigger: EHR technology presented for certification
Condition: if it is also certified to the certification criterion adopted at § 170.314(d)(2)
Precondition: the information required to be recorded in paragraph (e)(1)(ii)(A) is accessible by the patient

Text: For each meaningful use objective with a percentage-based measure, EHR technology must be able to create a report or file that enables a user to review the patients or actions that would make the patient or action eligible to be included in the measure's numerator.
Purpose: electronically create cancer case information
Trigger: in accordance with the standard (and applicable implementation specifications) specified in § 170.205(i)
Condition: in accordance with the standard (and applicable implementation specifications) specified in § 170.205(i)
System_response: electronically create cancer case information for electronic transmission

Text: The information in the report or file created must be of sufficient detail such that it enables a user to match those patients or actions to meet the measure's denominator limitations when necessary to generate an accurate percentage.
Purpose: enable a user to match patients or actions to meet the measure's denominator limitations
Trigger: when necessary to generate an accurate percentage
Condition: when necessary to generate an accurate percentage

Text: For each meaningful use objective with a percentage-based measure that is supported by a capability included in an EHR technology, electronically record the numerator and denominator and create a report including the numerator, denominator, and resulting percentage associated with each applicable meaningful use measure.
Purpose: enable a user to match patients or actions to meet the measure's denominator limitations
Trigger: when necessary to generate an accurate percentage
Condition: when necessary to generate an accurate percentage

Text: User-centered design processes must be applied to each capability an EHR technology includes that is specified in the following certification criteria: § 170.314(a)(1)  (2)  (6) through (8)  and (16) and (b)(3) and (4).
Purpose: enable a user to match patients or actions to meet the measure's denominator limitations
Trigger: when necessary to generate an accurate percentage
Condition: when necessary to generate an accurate percentage

Text: For each capability that an EHR technology includes and for which that capability's certification is sought, the use of a Quality Management System (QMS) in the development, testing, implementation and maintenance of that capability must be identified.
Purpose: enable a user to match patients or actions to meet the measure's denominator limitations
Trigger: when necessary to generate an accurate percentage
Condition: when necessary to generate an accurate percentage
